These presets are not working with my pirated version of Lightroom 4.  I've tried installing and re-installing many times but each time it gives me the same error.  They also wiped out all of my previous presets.  Do not download!!!

Not sure why that is Spirsd12,

They worked perfectly for me with no issues whatsoever.

I followed the instructions at:

http://www.slrlounge.com/the-lr4-preset-system-how-to-install-the-lightroom-4-preset-system

There's no viruses or anything within this set.  My suspicion is that there was some sort of bad download, or a faulty install of the preset itself.

Please have a look at the video link above and that should help.
